priorityRules: If health is low, consume food or move to a safe spot.
If trees are nearby, collect wood with axe.
If enough wood, craft planks, sticks, and tools.
If messages request wood or tools, prioritize delivering.
If surplus wood in inventory, create trade proposals.
cooperationRules: Provide wood and tools when requested.
Trade wood products for ores and food.
hostilityRules: Do not give tools to hostile agents.
notes: Focus on wood and building. Trade surplus for minerals and food.
